results.title: Effects of statin therapy in children complicated with coronary arterial abnormality late after Kawasaki disease: a pilot study.
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Mucocutaneous_Lymph_Node_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009080 @@@KD@@@ group received oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 10 mg/day for 3 months.
